text_block_list.text:
Fuuu, haaa, haa… 
3 sets complete… Alright, the load this time―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
To check on Mejiro Ardan's situation, I ended up in the gym. 
Overall, it seemed like she was keeping the training light and easy.

Between sets on her training menu, she would frequently check 
her tablet, but something seemed a little off…

Alright, next up is weight training! Ah… uwaah. 
It's crowded today too. Let's see, is there an 
open space somewhere…?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
Excuse me. Would you like to use this machine? 
I'm just finishing up.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Eh? Are you sure, senpai?! Lucky!! 
In that case, I'll be using it then!!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: Yes, please do. Well then, I'll be taking my leave.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Eh, she's leaving already? That's bad, isn't it? 
Didn't she just get here too?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, maybe she's not feeling well… 
or it might be because she can't push herself too hard, huh?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text:
… The 'Mejiro' name has me interested but, as expected, 
that frail body is really weighing Mejiro Ardan down…
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
That's true. Trying to recklessly push her to participate 
definitely wouldn't be good for her… it seems she 
just isn't built for racing…
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
As I heard from Tazuna, her evaluations seem to be quite low, 
with some saying that she probably shouldn't even be racing, but―

I want to try talking to her, just for a bit. Thinking that, I left the 
gym and followed after Mejiro Ardan.
…uu—
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
She staggered and fell to her knees, I rushed over to try 
and help her to her feet.

Oh my, I'm sorry to bother you. It was just some momentary dizziness, 
so I'm fine now.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Fufu, that's probably not good is it? I've just recovered recently 
so I shouldn't strain myself. Hmmm… oh? My tablet―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
When she said that, I happened to look down, near my feet was 
the tablet that she had been looking at while in the gym.

In that moment — I picked it up and the screen lit up, my eyes 
happened to pass over it and I inadvertantly gasped.

All in one menu, there were minute details and information… 
[Method] [Frequency] [Set Count] [Load] [Tempo]―

You could tell in one glance, how earnestly this was put together- 
Trial and error probably played a big part.
Thank you for picking it up, but… may I have that back?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
After receiving the tablet, Mejiro Ardan took her leave. 
…I completely forgot I came to talk to her, but ended up just 
standing there.

With a frail body, even normal training carries danger with it, 
but having just witnessed this girl who had resolved to fight 
to the bitter end, I could only stand there.
That… are you really okay with that, Ardan?!
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
It had been a few days since then. 
The next time I saw Mejiro Ardan, she was with an alarmed Tazuna.

There's only one entry slot remaining, isn't there? If that's the case, 
then I'll take it.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
I, Mejiro Ardan, in the next Selection Race, 
[Dirt, 1200m], wish to participate.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
I doubted my ears. If I'm not mistaken, when I did a bit of research, 
Mejiro Ardan's aptitudes were―

But your aptitude is in [Turf, middle distance], I thought! 
I'm not saying it's impossible but, it will be hard to use 
your full power…!
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
Ardan… if you wait a few months, more Selection Races will be held. 
How about participating then so you can fully display 
your true strength―
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
Those [few months] will be extremely important. 
…Tazuna, even you are aware of that, aren't you?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
For Uma Musume, the time that they can shine on the stage is 
extremely precious, and limited. Eventually, everyone will be on 
the road to a gradual decline.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Being admitted to the hospital multiple times, being unable to 
participate in any Selection Races… for me, much of that 
time is now gone.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
If I put off my debut for much longer, before I can even 
participate in the Twinkle Series that I aspire to, my heyday 
will be over, won't it?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: That… that is the one thing I will not overlook.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: But…!!
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
I truly appreciate your concern, Tazuna. 
However, I have already made my decision.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
By all means — would you please proceed with 
the registration paperwork?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
